title: How much do comic book writers earn? - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly i am writer, and my main problem wasnt how much i will make it was a matter of time, idea that you are asking someone to work for free while he could do something payable in that time. 90% of artists out there are asking for money upfront EVEN IF IT’T KICKSTARTER PROJECT. Drawings are +100$per page or less usually. There are even retarded people that won’t tell you they will charge upfront until project almost start. But if you manage to find good studio (very very hard) you dont need to worry about payments.

From sixteen bucks per page in small publishers to thousands of dollars per page in the big ones. That change from the publisher and how famous the writer is. Hower, this information was before the corona virus incident and the collapse of comics industry.At the moment I´m writing this answer things can change radically, because those small publishers that paid sixteen bucks can close tomorrow.
